comments.author: MattQb
comments.content:
I usually use a priority matrix to decide on what thing I should work first.
It's based on 3 arguments.
- Time it takes (shorter activities are highly ranked)
- Importance
- Urgency
Sometimes, important and urgent things will come before 5mins task ;)

comments.author: Matthieu F
comments.content:
I just do the tasks I prefer to do until the unlikely tasks become urgent, then I move to this one :p
I like to work on urgent tasks, it makes me really efficient but it can play you bad trick.
